name: Thinking About You
comments: Always thinking about you Vinny.............51 months ago today...oh my gosh.................
Great. Vocals by. Norah. And the. Music. Is. Well arranged
My cold hands needed a warm, warm touch. You hold my hand but do you really need me? Guess its time for me to let you go. I'll be thinking about you. Fave lyrics in the song.

Every song of the album is wonderful.
Just enjoy them slowly........
The video is very wonderful. You should watch it if you have not seen it. Watch it again, if you have seen it.
notuvoganitas, I agree. This song really makes me think about being in love.
I love this, it was my ringtone<3
Hi there,  enjoy "Seven Days" and "Esther", drumnvoice feat.Toke Modern GrooveJazz Quintet, www.last.fm/user/drumnvoice , best regards from Hanover/Berlin , home of the groove
This song fits perfectly how I am feeling now :( it is hard when in a long distance relationship
I need to hear this song right now
